title: The Week of Zelda Hayes: Tutor and Hero
summary: Over a week, Zelda Hayes, a retired teacher, discovers her superpowers and helps her community solve a mysterious problem.
summaryGerman: Über eine Woche entdeckt Zelda Hayes, eine pensionierte Lehrerin, ihre Superkräfte und hilft ihrer Gemeinschaft, ein mysteriöses Problem zu lösen.
summaryDutch: Gedurende een week ontdekt Zelda Hayes, een gepensioneerde lerares, haar superkrachten en helpt ze haar gemeenschap een mysterieus probleem op te lossen.
summaryFrench: Au cours d'une semaine, Zelda Hayes, une enseignante à la retraite, découvre ses superpouvoirs et aide sa communauté à résoudre un problème mystérieux.

story.text: Zelda Hayes smiles as she prepares her tutoring materials. She feels a strange sensation while organizing her books—each feels lighter than air.
Continuing her tutoring, Zelda accidentally moves a heavy desk with a mere touch. Astonished, she realizes she might have super strength.
Zelda decides to test her new abilities at night. She stops a robbery effortlessly, feeling an adrenaline rush and responsibility.
Word of her deeds spreads, and her phone rings non-stop with people asking for help. Zelda feels overwhelmed but committed.
Zelda balances her day between tutoring and heroics. She saves a cat from a tree and helps resolve a local dispute, feeling content and useful.
The community shows its gratitude with a small ceremony. Zelda feels loved and valued, realizing her dual impact.
Reflecting on her week, Zelda vows to continue her dual life, enriching her community with knowledge and protection.

ending: Thus began the dual life of Zelda Hayes: dedicated tutor by day, unsung hero by night.
moral: No matter the age, everyone can make a significant difference in their community.
